text: Mark off the width and height of the picture. Add guidelines for Deidara’s body. Draw the shape of his head.
Draw Deidara’s body, neck and cloak.
Add guidelines for the arms, legs and headband.
Outline the shape of his sleeves, the collar, trousers and ears of the boy.
Draw Deidara’s hands and arms, feet, eyes and hair.
Detail the clothes, lifted hand and hair.
Work on the figure, paying special attention to detail.
Contour Deidara, trying to vary the thickness and blackness of the line. Add more detail and add the ground. Erase all guidelines.
